html:
2.15.18  2:21 am   what keeps you up at night?

     sleeping during the day

2.15.18  2:10 am   What is your favorite mode of transportation?

     quantum tunneling

2.15.18  1:12 am   how do you feel about earth

     pretty good

2.15.18  1:10 am   Why did you open a page for questions?

     to see if people would ask me questions

2.15.18  12:51 am   what's your favorite history fact you've ever learned?

     it's going faster now

2.15.18  12:31 am   What's your opinion on quiche?

     i'm not sure i have ever encountered it in real life

2.15.18  12:30 am   Which do you prefer, personal or spiritual fulfillment? 

     what about personal spiritual fulfillment

2.15.18  12:25 am   does Canada even exist?

     i will check

2.15.18  12:09 am   hey man, on a scale of one to ten, how much do you like making youtube videos?

     i don't really make videos specifically for youtube

2.14.18  11:59 pm   living in a cave of sorts is really productive and good for me in general, but not knowing abt shifts popular language/custom makes me feel a bit aaaaaaaaaa.

     i know it can feel that way some times, but just staying reasonable and thinking on your feet can go a long way. and maybe just try to follow some hot twitter accounts or something

      like i used the phrase 'thinking cap' the other day and found out that it's an irrelevant term that no one uses now apparently?

     that's bullshit, that's a great phrase and i love to use it. the fact that it's s little offbeat actually increases its value

      like. this isn't something I dwell on but it irks me nonetheless. the price of living under a rock i guess. do u know what I mean? if u do what are ur thoughts on this?

     you're gonna be fine. just keep having fun and being creative. besides, if you pay too much attention to the mainstream that can actually backfire and set you up for obscelescence in a surprisingly short amount of time, whereas from your cave (or anywhere) just using your hot mind, you might have a surprisingly advantageous ability to be effortlessly and resourcefully ahead of the curve or even define the curve for others. i mean come on, do you really want to be someone who says 'aesthetic' 100 times a day or do you want to try something with a bit more flavour

2.14.18  11:58 pm   HOW do i talk to girls

     try to ignore their gender if that's a source of confusion for you

2.14.18  11:54 pm   Tell me the secrets of the universe

     i am trying

2.14.18  11:44 pm   Hey Bill, it's Isaac.

     oh hi

2.14.18  11:27 pm   Is it normal for you hate a video you've been working on for at least a month to have people tell you it's great when you've grown to hate it?

     sure. but the moment it's released i quickly forget what's in it

2.14.18  11:09 pm   What is your favorite podcast?

     the one where they spend the entire time thanking each other for being on the program and thanking the listeners for listening to it, and also for listening to the previous one, and also telling them what time the next one will be and thanking them in advance for listening to that one as well, in addition to thanking their next guests in advance for being on that one

2.14.18  11:07 pm   do you take inspiration from Frank zappa?

     no

2.14.18  10:56 pm   gravity is confusing !! i want to learn more !!

     don't we all. the only strategy i have for now is just try to think like the gravity. you may gain some insight. but this day and age that's about all i can suggest

2.14.18  10:56 pm   is there a limit to the amount of boys that can be in a boyband it becomes too much?

If so, what is it?

     industry standard seems to be 5

2.14.18  10:55 pm   Bill you need to go look up your name on Google. Maybe I just noticed it and it's always been there, but Google classifies your music as pop. How do you feel about this?

     great. that's a good sign. it means you're winning the game

2.14.18  10:50 pm   Are you a conspiracy theory?

     i am doing the conspiracy

2.14.18  10:43 pm   have you arrived yet?

     i am on my way

2.14.18  10:42 pm   Bill quick question when will you do a video on the scale of like the history of japan or world those are good

     whenever i think it's a strong career move to go several months without a video release

2.14.18  10:34 pm   What are the soap gods favorite flavors of soap?

     whatever sells the best

2.14.18  10:31 pm   I've noticed that you used 3d models in your recent videos. Is this a new thing, or have you been doing it for a while?

     i started doing that for history of the entire world i guess, and it has been part of my repertoire ever since

2.14.18  10:09 pm   when you hit a block while creating, do you take walks/leave the house to get a fresher perspective, or does that mess up your thought process during the work session?

     it could help

2.14.18  10:07 pm   What is squarespace?

     i don't care

2.14.18  10:01 pm   dear Mr.Bill Wurtz, will you ever make another note in your notebook on this website? I find them really cool and funny [Post scriptum, Your vidoes are amazing].

     for an advanced peak at what may later go to the notes page, or otherwise just daily short notes, please go to my twitter page

2.14.18  9:57 pm   do you think the data is conclusive ?

     which data

2.14.18  9:46 pm   why does the earth have to be so round? do you think earth should give other shapes a chance?

     it is not practical nor convenient for something not to be round if it's spinning in space for millions of years

2.14.18  9:27 pm   Hey bill lately I've been really hesitant about creating something because I know that I won't be satisfied with anything I create. And it really really sucks. It's just that I suck at what I do and I'm really just struggling with this. 

     what do you mean you suck at what you do, i thought you said you weren't even doing it

2.14.18  9:25 pm   i hate math because I'm bad at it. can I still be good at math though

     maybe

2.14.18  9:23 pm   why do u think l.a. and alabama are cold

     they are actually pretty hot, especially alabama

2.14.18  9:02 pm   Who's the cutest boy from 1D?

     in not interested in how 1D looks, i'm interested in how the final record sounds

2.14.18  9:02 pm   When you watch TV, does the TV watch back?

     nowadays yes

2.14.18  8:57 pm   Do you get video ideas from dreams?

     sometimes

      f not, does anything specificly inspire you when making a video?

     sometimes

2.14.18  8:52 pm   WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO WITH MY HANDS AND ARMS WHEN I AM DANCING?

     something useful, practical, and productive

2.14.18  8:52 pm   What's your favorite anime? Mine is Seinfeld

     the presidency of donald j. trump

2.14.18  8:50 pm   Where's Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch?

     somewhere near by, i suspect

2.14.18  8:47 pm   Bill in one of your videos you talk about where you came from and how it's not fun, where are you from and why isn't it fun there?

     those are lyrics in a song i wrote. not something i talked about

2.14.18  8:37 pm   are you using youtube as a means to communicate to earth from another dimension?

     my website is much better for that, because i can do things just the way i want. other sites require you to use exactly the dimensions they provide

2.14.18  8:32 pm   how many boxes can you fit in a slightly bigger box?

     about 1.2

2.14.18  8:26 pm   when you get the live band thing happening, do you think you'll have visuals from your videos onstage?

     absolutely not

      or maybe new visuals that we haven't seen before?

     no video

      visuals or not, I will travel cross-country to come to your concert someday if I have to

2.14.18  8:20 pm   Why do you never revisit your older creations

     because there are more new ones

2.14.18  8:08 pm   do you have a go-to joke? if so, what is it?

     being normal

2.14.18  7:59 pm   You mispeled questions. 

     you did not take into account the color scheme

2.14.18  7:58 pm   If you clean the vacuum cleaner are you the vacuum cleaner?

     the vacuum cleaner cleaner, i would presume

2.14.18  7:50 pm   Are you able to detect the exact pH of an orange by taking a bite out of it?

     no, i can't even get the damn thing open

     If so, give the record right here.

2.14.18  7:46 pm   How do i know that Im not me?

     you are you

2.14.18  7:34 pm   I've written several questions and none of them have been answered, why is that?

     because i answered someone else's question instead

2.14.18  7:32 pm   What's a good leslie neilson pun you like? I always thought of him as doing more slapstick type stuff. Side Note: I watched 'Dracula: Dead And Loving It' the other night. I love that movie. 

     well, the 'shirley' one is a timeless classic. but the 'nice beaver' was very well executed on screen
